element.short: Description of the event as a whole
element.definition: Text description about the reaction as a whole, including details of the manifestation if required.
element.comment: Use the description to provide any details of a particular event of the occurred reaction such as circumstances, reaction specifics, what happened before/after. Information, related to the event, but not describing a particular care should be captured in the comment field. For example: at the age of four, the patient was given penicillin for strep throat and subsequently developed severe hives.
